message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price around $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that amount?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think it's worth a bit more than $90. How about we discuss a price of $110?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $105? That's the highest I'm willing to go.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I think you're getting close to the product's value. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. How about we meet at $115?
I'm really close to walking away, but I still think I can get a better deal. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110? That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
I'm not willing to go all the way to $110, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from our last discussion. How about we settle at $112?
